nws.name: Overnight
nws.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 67. South wind around 5 mph.

nws.name: Wednesday
nws.shortForecast: Partly Sunny then Slight Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
nws.detailedForecast: A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms after 3pm. Partly sunny. High near 83, with temperatures falling to around 81 in the afternoon. South wind 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

nws.name: Wednesday Night
nws.shortForecast: Slight Chance Showers And Thunderstorms then Showers And Thunderstorms
nws.detailedForecast: A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms before 9pm, then showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy. Low around 66, with temperatures rising to around 68 overnight. South southeast wind 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

nws.name: Thursday
nws.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms. Cloudy. High near 75, with temperatures falling to around 71 in the afternoon. South wind around 10 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New rainfall amounts between a half and three quarters of an inch possible.

nws.name: Thursday Night
nws.detailedForecast: Rain showers before 9pm, then showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy. Low around 61, with temperatures rising to around 63 overnight. South wind 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%.

nws.name: Friday
nws.shortForecast: Slight Chance Rain Showers then Sunny
nws.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers before noon. Sunny. High near 76, with temperatures falling to around 72 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

nws.name: Friday Night
nws.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 53. West northwest wind around 5 mph.

nws.name: Saturday
nws.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 71. North wind around 5 mph.

nws.name: Saturday Night
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 53. Northeast wind around 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

nws.name: Sunday
nws.shortForecast: Chance Showers And Thunderstorms then Showers And Thunderstorms Likely
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms before noon, then showers and thunderstorms likely. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 67. Chance of precipitation is 60%.

nws.name: Sunday Night
nws.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms likely. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 56. Chance of precipitation is 70%.

nws.name: Monday
nws.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms likely. Some of the storms could produce heavy rain. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 65. Chance of precipitation is 70%.

nws.name: Monday Night
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 52. Chance of precipitation is 40%.

nws.name: Tuesday
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers. Mostly sunny, with a high near 67. Chance of precipitation is 30%.
